Ability.Name: Arcane Brilliance
Ability.Lua:
if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
local mytarget = nil local mytargetmana = 0 local doneFM = false local allinrange = true local missint = false local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberpower = UnitPowerMax(member) if UnitBuffID(member, 54646,"PLAYER") then doneFM = true end if not UnitBuffID(member, 1459) and not UnitBuffID(member, 61316) then missint = true end if not UnitInRange(member) or UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) then allinrange = false end if memberpower > mytargetmana and not UnitIsUnit("player",member) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) and not UnitBuffID(member, 54646) then mytarget = member mytargetmana = memberpower end end
if mytarget and not doneFM and allinrange and IsSpellKnown(54646) then CastSpellByID(54646, mytarget) end
if ( allinrange and missint ) or ( not UnitBuffID("player", 1459) and not UnitBuffID("player", 61316) ) then return true end
end
